item.description:
Celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Newport Folk Festival with some classic folk superstars: Pete Seeger, Joan Baez Judi Collins and Arlo Guthrie would each be worth the price of admission alone! Spend the day in beautiful Fort Adams State Park in Newport surrounded by the ocean - great music, food, people-watching and a good dose of love and peace. You can't beat it..Tickets are $69 for the day and will go fast! Carpooling will be attempted ..!! Bring your rug, binoculars and a picnic...this will be a day to remember.

All information is on the website at www.folkfestival50.com BUY YOUR OWN TICKETS ON THIS WEBSITE ASAP. I am charging $1 pp for organizing which you can pay on the day - but you will have to pay $69 on-line for a one day pass. Parking is $12 - let me know if you can offer to drive and we'll see what works. Passengers will share parking fee with drivers. I will be driving early from Marblehead so can pick up 3 people in Swampscott, Lynn, or Wonderland on route.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the merch tent at 12 noon - or rendezvous by cellphone
item.name: Newport Folk Festival 50th
